*
         * @prop {Boolean|undefined} useSystemTimezone
         * @default false
         * @description
         *   Skip the user local time calculation, and show the date in the system timezone.

trailingComments.value: Use time zone values from the store:
- User configured time zone or default time zone for users

leadingComments.value: Use time zone values from the store:
- User configured time zone or default time zone for users

trailingComments.value: Assume passed timestamp is in current system timezone.

leadingComments.value: Assume passed timestamp is in current system timezone.

trailingComments.value: Convert timestamp to current user timezone. Return both moment object and assumed timezone string.

leadingComments.value: Convert timestamp to current user timezone. Return both moment object and assumed timezone string.

*
         * @method
         * @public
         * @name localizeTimestamp
         * @description
         *   Convert timestamp to current user timezone. Return both moment object and assumed timezone string.

*

Use time zone values from the store:
- User configured time zone or default time zone for users
Assume passed timestamp is in current system timezone.
Convert timestamp to current user timezone. Return both moment object and assumed timezone string.
